pullRequest.title: Provide AVRO plugin
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please answer these questions before submitting pull request

Why submit this pull request?
 Bug fix
 New feature provided
 Improve performance

Provide Avro plugin
checklist:

 update component-libraries.yml
 update supported-library.md
 add ico into skywalking-web
 testcase
 unit test

Screenshot

nodes.bodyText: LOG to logger? I remember most codes use this.
Is this check really meaningful? Such as in some cases, the context wouldn't be active? This Check is also a payload.
Don't use this kind of format. Please change it to normal one.
nodes.diffHunk:

+  applications:
+    - {avro-server: 2}
+    - {avro-client: 3}
+  instances:
+    - {avro-server: 1}
+    - {avro-client: 1}
+  operationNames:
+    - avro-server: [example.proto.Greeter.hello]
+    - avro-client: [/avro-scenario/case/healthCheck, /avro-scenario/case/avro-scenario]
+  heartbeat: []
+segmentItems:
+  - applicationCode: avro-server
+    segmentSize: 1
+    segments:
+      - segmentId: not null
+        spans:
+          - operationName: example.proto.Greeter.hello
+            operationId: 0
+            parentSpanId: -1
+            spanId: 0
+            spanLayer: RPCFramework
+            startTime: gt 0
+            endTime: gt 0
+            componentId: 82
+            componentName: ''
+            isError: false
+            spanType: Entry
+            peer: ''
+            peerId: 0
+            refs:
+              - {parentEndpointId: 0, parentEndpoint: /avro-scenario/case/avro-scenario, networkAddressId: 0,
+                 entryEndpointId: 0, refType: CrossProcess, parentSpanId: 1, parentTraceSegmentId: not null,

+    segmentSize: ge 2
+    segments:
+      - segmentId: not null
+        spans:
+          - {operationName: example.proto.Greeter.hello, operationId: 0, parentSpanId: 0,

commit.message: Merge branch 'avro-plugin-devel' of https://github.com/dmsolr/skywalking into avro-plugin-devel
Merge branch 'avro-plugin-devel' of https://github.com/dmsolr/skywalking into avro-plugin-devel
